0.1.name: wordpress/nivo-affiliate
0.1.description:
Easily add Nivo Slider affiliate banners to your posts, pages and sidebars.

To use this plugin you must have a Nivo Slider Affiliate account. Sign up here

Full list of features:

  • Widget for sidebars.
  • Shortcode for pages and posts.
  • Choose from all the banners available.
  • Control the advert link behaviour (open in new window) and alt tag of the banner image.
  • Plugin support section.

If you have any issues or feature requests please visit and use the Support Forum

Plugin Page | @polevaultweb | Donate with PayPal
